But yeah it's a bit of a parody of NTR's in that the husband enjoys letting other guys try to cuck him and then calls them over to show his dominance by fucking his wife's brain out. The wife is seemingly just someone who either just is a nympho or does it cause she loves how her husband goes all dom on her after someone else has tried to get her. She doesn't seem to enjoy it all that much with the other guys since I believe they say she's faking it with them.

Lol the one on p. 47 - 70 was kinda funny. If I have understood it correctly pretty much it starts with the young fit guy sending a video of the wife being fucked and calling her his sex slave and the husband should just back of cause she's all his now. Then were also shown that two other guys also made a move on her and said she's their property now. Then the husband reveals that it's all for fun and that hundreds of guys have already challenged him for her love and that he welcomes anyone to challenge him for her hand by fucking her and if anyone is better then him he'd gladly hand her over. But then the wife starts pointing out how they all dissapointed her in some way. I believefor the fit guy that it's all fake like being in a porno, the working guy talks way to much and doesn't focus on the sex and well the old guy has no stamina or something. Then the husband pulls out his huge dick and tells them he'll show them how she really likes it and then makes her cum over and over

before going something like, thats how you satisfy her. Then the wife is all I love you dear! Then the husband ends by saying but your all welcome to rechallenge me for her hand at any time! Lastly I am unsure what the three guys are thinking cause it's get translated to something like "you wish!" so it would seem they all get pissed at his married couple for using them and then rubbing it all in their faces.
